text:
@va_shiva @realDonaldTrump Current US Population is 331 002 651 x 0.1% = 331 003. 
Current US deaths 135 203 (according to Johns Hopkins). 
I fail to see your point. https://t.co/QjBMtwUAPH
Curious as to how many Covid-19 patients you've treated.
